text: Zhang Jixin () (1874–1952) was a Chinese calligrapher and politician of the Republic of China. He was born in Tieling in modern Liaoning. He was the 13th mayor of Beijing as a member of the Beiyang government. ==Bibliography== * * * * 「義達里：婉容外祖父的貝勒府」『北京青年報』2006年10月24日。 Category:1874 births Category:1952 deaths Category:Republic of China politicians from Liaoning Category:Republic of China calligraphers Category:Mayors of Beijing Category:Politicians from Tieling Category:Qing dynasty people Category:Artists from Liaoning Category:Republic of China people born during Qing
title: Zhang Jixin
